title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 10030.5 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 10030.5 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

The office shall accept requests for records and produce
records during the following hours: 10 a.m. to 4 p.m., except on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
10030.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
